description.@en: Any little shake of the hand may ruin a piece, making me have to do the work all over again.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Any object you engrave is treated and appraised at its full value. Furthermore, you may flip the results to succeed at Skill Tests to identify and create engraved objects.
